title: Generated ActionData type from './$types' is always unknown
body:
### Describe the bug I tried to migrate my project to the newest sveltekit version but the ActionData type imported from './$types' is always unknown. I then tried to reproduce the issue by creating a new project from scratch and the result is the same. I edited +page.svelte and added a +page.server.ts as follows. `+page.svelte` ![CleanShot 2022-09-07 at 09 33 03](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32997810/188830921-0f5e116d-ac18-4a0c-9562-1c43b6bcf869.png) `+page.server.ts` ![CleanShot 2022-09-07 at 09 29 51](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32997810/188830198-846ef95f-c360-4372-bee2-972e7ae95851.png) The error at the script tag complains another error, still I am not sure if that is related. ![CleanShot 2022-09-07 at 09 32 03](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32997810/188830723-e81c4163-ea00-4b9e-95aa-f1991c642cd2.png) ### Reproduction ### Git Repository https://github.com/harrylaulau/sveltekittest ### Steps 1. created with: `npm create svelte@latest test` Options: skeleton project, typescript, eslint, prttier enabled. ![CleanShot 2022-09-07 at 09 46 21](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32997810/188833951-926c3cd4-8ab4-44e8-9bb7-bd33d7af1367.png) 3. Edited Files: `src/routes/+page.svelte` ```html

Welcome to SvelteKit

Visit kit.svelte.dev to read the documentation

``` `src/routes/+page.server.ts` ```ts import type { Actions } from './$types'; export const actions: Actions = { default: async () => { return { success: true }; } }; ``` ### Logs ```shell console.log successfully output true when the form button is pressed ``` ### System Info ```shell System: OS: macOS 12.5.1 CPU: (10) arm64 Apple M1 Max Memory: 4.19 GB / 32.00 GB Shell: 5.8.1 - /bin/zsh Binaries: Node: 16.15.0 - ~/.nvm/versions/node/v16.15.0/bin/node Yarn: 1.22.19 - ~/Library/pnpm/yarn npm: 8.12.1 - ~/.nvm/versions/node/v16.15.0/bin/npm Watchman: 2022.08.15.00 - /opt/homebrew/bin/watchman Browsers: Chrome: 104.0.5112.101 Safari: 15.6.1 npmPackages: @sveltejs/adapter-auto: next => 1.0.0-next.71 @sveltejs/kit: next => 1.0.0-next.475 svelte: ^3.44.0 => 3.50.0 vite: ^3.1.0 => 3.1.0 ``` ### Severity serious, but I can work around it ### Additional Information This is from the generated `$types.d.ts` file. Not sure if this screen shot is helpful. ![CleanShot 2022-09-07 at 09 43 24](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32997810/188833213-feeee130-3c0b-4cdd-b534-cb0e690188c7.png)
